name: Scribble Scurry
description:
Reach the flag to complete the level.

This game was made for the Friday Night Game Jam 2022-52 in 3 hours. All of the sprites were taken from Kenney sprite sheets, as per the jam's requirements, while all of the code, levels and music were made within the 3 hours.

This only has 6 levels and 5 drum tracks due to the time requirement.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Click to shoot in the direction of the mouse

Kenney Sprite Sheets used:

https://kenney.nl/assets/scribble-platformer

https://kenney.nl/assets/scribble-dungeons
